description: Asaba Yuuko is http://anidb.net/ch6962 [Naoyuki]`s younger sister who is in junior high school. She tends to be very loud and annoying to her older brother and does not back down easily. When Naoyuki went on a date with http://anidb.net/ch6961 [Kana], Yuuko ended up following and spying on them, which is probably because she was interested in finding out who Kana was.
name: Asaba Yuuko
